title: Воскресенье в женской бане
overview: The series takes place in a sports and beauty complex, where a group of friends, relatively young and well-off, gather on Sundays: after all, visiting a bathhouse in this complex is not a cheap pleasure. The women undergo health procedures and at the same time have endless conversations. Regular meetings on Sundays give the friends the opportunity to speak out: during the week, each of them has a lot of events that they need to tell each other about - and they share their experiences, ask each other for advice and, of course, gossip.The viewers are presented with a whole gallery of women's destinies - so different and at the same time so similar. After all, all visitors to the "women's bathhouse" without exception are concerned with the same problems: money, sex, external attractiveness, relationships with husbands, lovers, children and parents, career ups and downs, fortune telling, dreams and omens. But the main thing is that all women are united by the eternal dream of simple human happiness...
